alert.note: Alert for Corson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 4:26PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Corson County through 530 PM MDT... At 425 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorm near Mclaughlin, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mclaughlin around 440 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Little Eagle and Mahto. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
